data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rifkind, Jacques (2017): New species of Mutillid Mimicking Enoclerus Gahan (Coleoptera: Cleridae: Clerinae) from Mexico and Central America. Zootaxa 4231 (3): 409-420, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4231.3.7|35 occurrences
